description.value:
These actions are all available to all characters, but have no effects to automate in Foundry. You can use any of them at will.

For a full explanation, see @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.C3b7Ref9xEVn34Gf.JournalEntryPage.iKdgcGD8qwTF1yx7]{Standard Actions}. @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.Item.w3jjiADMUEZNKvsO]{Dodge} and @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.Item.gR13n0dtX2w8sazy]{Help} are added directly to your character.

Actions

&reference[Attack]

&reference[Dash]

&reference[Disengage]

&reference[Hide]

&reference[Influence]

&reference[Ready]
